Relation.isPartOf: Kango Takamura Paintings (Collection 433). UCLA Library Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, UCLA.
Description.caption: "Our pet hawk died on May 22. The following day Mr. Sato of Chula Vista, died but same day over 80 of us internees were released. May 22, 1942." Unsigned. [Japanese characters].
Format.medium: watercolor and ink on paper, matted
Title: Our pet hawk died, 1942 May 22.
AltTitle.uniform: Our pet hawk died on May 22. The following day Mr. Sato of Chula Vista died. But same day over 80 of us internees were released.

Relation.isPartOf: Kango Takamura Paintings (Collection 433). UCLA Library Special Collections, Charles E. Young Research Library, UCLA.
Description.caption: "At evening I sketched this beautiful, unusual cloud formation. All at us noticed it. We wondered whether these might mean that we would be at peace. May 31, 1942."  Signed "K> Takamura." [Japanese characters].
Title: At evening I sketched this unusual cloud formation, 1942 May 31.
AltTitle.uniform: At evening I sketched this beautiful, unusual cloud formation. All of us noticed it. We wondered whether these might mean that we would be at peace.
